summary:
James: Alright people, Let’s do this thing. Go, Team Dynamite!
Peter: But I thought we agreed we’d go by the name Team Super...
body:
James: Alright people, Let’s do this thing. Go, Team Dynamite!
Peter: But I thought we agreed we’d go by the name Team Super Cool.
Sirius: As I recall, it was Team Awesome!
Remus: I voted for Team Alpha Wolf Squadron.
James: Alright, alright, alright! From henceforth, we shall be known as Team Alpha Super-Awesome-Cool Dynamite Wolf-Squadron.

blog.name: howling-at-night
blog.title: Welcome To My Life
blog.description: So... I'm not sure where to start. You ever feel like even though the world is moving, you don't? It might be silly, but lately I feel like everything is not enough and too much, all at the same time, moving to fast for me to keep up, and yet standing still. Something's come up and then you blink and just like that it's suddenly... gone. Is a long life still ahead of me or am I too late already? Have I done enough? Am I enough? I don't know. Honestly, I'm not sure anyone can answer that. I suppose we'll have to see, won't we?

Rowan//22//He/They NonBinary Bi Ahsoka Tano makes me cry and so does sand so I'm probably Anakin Skywalker. Marvel/Star Trek. Im equal parts Jake, Gina and Rosa from Brooklyn 99. I still love the MCU try and stop me. Monty AKA ‘Lightning’ McQueen, 7 time Piston cup champion (2007-2014) is my one true love.

Current fleeting obsession: MacGyver. Sometimes I cosplay shit. I want Andy Hurley to throw a drumstick into my chest, killing me instantly. TEAM IRON MAN WE LOVE TONY STARK NETWORK

summary: draco malfoy, experiencing his 3rd flare up this year: how the hell is it that we can regrow bones but still can't permanently...
body:
draco malfoy, experiencing his 3rd flare up this year: how the hell is it that we can regrow bones but still can’t permanently clear up acne. wizards are fuckin’ useless

harry, who has never had a pimple in his life: *shrugs*

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

blog.name: wallflowerdandelion
blog.title: Once upon a time...
blog.description:
Once upon a time... è così che cominciano tutte le storie più belle,peccato la mia non sia una favola.
Vivo nei libri e nella musica per scappare alla realtà che però tuttora mi perseguita. 
Cerco sempre di essere me stessa ,tuttavia spesso sbaglio mettendomi da parte per dedicarmi agli altri,non tutti apprezzano il gesto.
Dedico la maggior parte del mio tempo allo studio,nei ritagli di spazio mi piace leggere o scrivere qualcosa di mio pugno.
Ho l' hobby del disegno e della scrittura che mi permettono di allargare i miei orizzonti e di scrivere piccoli pensieri per portare un sorriso o una lacrima,ma di commozione e nulla più.
Mi piace aiutare gli altri perché non avendo io per prima mai ricevuto aiuto dalla parte di nessuno so come ci si sente e non voglio che più nessuno si senta così finché io posso impedirlo.Ho salvato tanti,ottenuto grazie da qualcuno e odio da più d' uno ma ora stanno meglio e io sono felice di questo.
Sono come una cisterna ,ma invece di immagazzinare acqua immagazino dolore sottraggo il dolore altrui e lo faccio mio lo assorbo in me in cambio di un loro sorriso.
Oltre a ciò quando ho del tempo mi piace leggere manga come Death Note oppure Sailor Moon o guardare qualche altro anime.
Sono un' adulta all' anagrafe ma una bambina nel cuore.
Timida fino al midollo con il sesso forte non so mai come comportarmi..arrossendo per un nonnulla ,sono più a mio agio negli angoli dove nessuno mi nota che al centro dell' attenzione. Se tu lettore hai bisogno scrivi pure.
Wallflower|| 21||

summary: I do not see why we can not hold people accountable while stretching the limits of our own compassion to have more and more. I...
text: I do not see why we can not hold people accountable while stretching the limits of our own compassion to have more and more. I would say ‘to have it for more and more humans’, but it’s 'Fantastic Beasts’ so, to have more for every creature really. It seems like a personal call and it’s part of my interest in acting and storytelling. As much as to let off steam, go out of the way of history and let it build itself.
source: Ezra Miller (about empathizing with characters whose actions are questionable) (x)

reblog.comment: Ezra Miller (about empathizing with characters whose actions are questionable) (x)
